thread.section_title: Driver Support Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Driver Support | driversupport.com
thread.title: Thomas A Kummer
thread.title_full: Driver Support reviewed by Thomas A Kummer

author: Thomas A Kummer
title: Thomas A Kummer
text:
Even with the system crash I was able to go back and complete my download. Just had to press a button and it installed each one. It was also very easy to press a FIX button for those problem drivers.
The software was easy to install and fixed problem drivers found during the scan..
I highly recommend Driver Support and will pass my advice to my friends.
Tom Kummer
